module.name: ap210_assembly_functional_interface_requirements
module.name.french: SpÃ©cifications d'interface fonctionnelle d'assemblage pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module, terminal, assembly, electrical, protocol, connector, simulation model, behavioural model

abstract.li: functional interface requirements including signal names, connector pin or pin group names attached to those signal names, minimal connector identification, functional simulation models for the product, association to documentation, and configuration management information associated with the management of that information;
the information is from an electro-mechanical design and analysis viewpoint but is more widely applicable.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assembly functional interface requirements. Assembly functional interface requirements includes the following information: functional interface model, signal constraints, external definition support, Product identification, functional simulation. Support for documentation is provided.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Assembly module usage view, ISO/TS 10303-1642;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628.
